attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All of the mobile networks charge between 15p-35p a minute to phone a 0800 number. This even applies to people having a mobile phone contract. Companies use 0800 numbers to make it easier and cheaper for customers to phone them. Not all 0800 numbers are charged - for example Childline and some networks make breakdown companies numbers free. Some people just have a mobile. It will be only fair if the networks start making calls to 0800 numbers for free.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
